text: Michel Aoun (, ; born 18 February 1935) is a Lebanese politician. He was the 17th President of Lebanon from 31 October 2016 to 30 October 2022. He was elected on the 46th electoral session of the Lebanese parliament, breaking a 29-month deadlock. He is a Maronite Christian and the founder of the Free Patriotic Movement. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Current national leaders Category:Presidents of Lebanon Category:Prime ministers of Lebanon
title: Michel Aoun
